metadata.Title: CVE-2023-43641

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 12 SP5

metadata.Description: libcue provides an API for parsing and extracting data from CUE sheets. Versions 2.2.1 and prior are vulnerable to out-of-bounds array access. A user of the GNOME desktop environment can be exploited by downloading a cue sheet from a malicious webpage. Because the file is saved to `~/Downloads`, it is then automatically scanned by tracker-miners. And because it has a .cue filename extension, tracker-miners use libcue to parse the file. The file exploits the vulnerability in libcue to gain code execution. This issue is patched in version 2.3.0.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP5 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 12 SP5 is installed
